ygData.subject: Re: Why are you playing a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Howard Chan  ... banded Where is Runnyeye? ... it ... coolness ... start ... Thanks for the tips, the board was slow for a while,
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>

> From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
> Blackened armor can be obtained at Runnyeye. At level 10, I had full
banded

Where is Runnyeye?


> armor except for the cape and helm. The helm I had was steel plate and the
> cape was leather. Then I decided that the plate helm looked ugly and sold
it
> to purchase blackened armor (tunic, pants, belt, crown, bracer, sleeves,
> glove). The blackened armor would be the best equipment in terms of
coolness
> and AC. But when you reach a higher level, you would then be obligated to
> switch back to banded (because the blackened is heavy and the loot you
start
> getting becomes heavier also) or bronze for the AC.

Thanks for the tips, the board was slow for a while, good to see posts.

Dharsage, Shadow 10 on Tanure
